description:
Description


BODY EXFOLIATION: Streptococcus Thermophilus Ferment gently exfoliates dead skin and minimizes the appearance of pores, with clinical tests showing up to 61.3% improvement in skin texture.
MOISTURE BOOST: Icelandic Glacier Water & Cabbage Extract with Betaine and Panthenol deeply hydrate, preventing dryness and chapping while improving skin smoothness for nourished, soft, and healthy skin.
SOOTHING ENERGY: Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate and Menthol soothe irritated, itchy skin, improving dryness and Keratosis Pilaris, while Icelandic Glacier Water enhances hydration with its mineral-rich formula.
6-FLOWER EXTRACT: Patented 6 Flower Extract Blend helps maintain oil-water balance, delivering nourishing hydration for healthier, revitalized skin.
CLINICALLY TESTED: Clinical tests show up to 61.3% improvement in pore size, volume, area, and skin hydration with consistent use.
 
How To Use

After a shower, remove moisture and evenly spray from 15–20cm away from the body.
 
Key Ingredients

Contains non-artificial ingredients including clean deep water from Ireland and cabbage leaf extract to improve dead skin cells wastes deep inside skin.
The blue complex developed with 6 kinds of blue flowers is added with the glacial milk from Ireland, which has the cleanest ecosystem in the world.

description:
Description

CALM & TACKLE ACNE: Packed with Centella Asiatica + Manuka Honey, this body mist fights and relieves body acne while giving deep hydration without being sticky or drying out.
SMOOTH & CLEAR BODY: Infused with PHA & LHA for sensitive skin, unlike other harsh exfoliating products, this body mist gently lifts dead skin cells from the surface of the skin for a visibly smoother complexion without breaking skin barrier.
GET RID OF KP: Stop using harsh exfoliants on your strawberry legs. Spray this body mist to softly remove dead skin cells and moisturize to smooth out bumpy legs.
Unscented and Alcohol-free for those with sensitive skin.
Sustainable & Eco-friendly Parnell: 30% PCR + FSC + Soy Ink Packaging.
Clean and Green Parnell: We believe in the power of Nature. Parnell aims to source clean raw materials from New Zealand and, where possible, work with sustainable groups of local communities.

description:
Description


- Take a rest before you go to bed with a comfortable aroma blend that you feel the more you spray
- It is a pillow mist that warms your body and mind on a quiet night and helps you sleep comfortably
- Lavender is like a warm touch that allows for deep meditation and touches the inner depths, and Sandalwood helps erase the inner dizziness and reach a state of tranquility
- Spraying 1 or 2 times lightly on bedding 10 minutes before going to bed gives you a full rest in a deep night's calm mood
 
How To Use

Shake it to mix well before use and spray it evenly on bedding and textile products at a distance of 20-30 cm 
 
Key Ingredients

Lavender oil, masoram oil, sandalwood oil, lavandin oil, bergamot oil, benzoin oil, elemioil, mandarin oil

product_name: *renewal* Dress & Living Clear Perfume Set(10 Sense)
description:
Description


The W.DRESSROOM Dress & Living Clear Perfume 10 Sense Set consists of its 10 most popular fragrances. These multi-purpose fragrance sprays remove 99.9% of bacteria, germs, and odors. Each scent can help boost your mood and refresh the air.

No.03 Baby Green tea 30ml : A refreshing green tea musk scent that combines the softness of green tea leaves with the freshness of citrus. 
No.09 Cogo Mango 30ml : Sweet real mango scent that is richly concentrated in the middle of lush rainforest. 
No.30 White Musk 30ml : A clean, pure Maersk scent that blends jasmine and iris with a hint of mint. 
No.40 Chic Amber 30ml : On a midsummer night, the harmonious combination of musk and green apple, as soft as the wind blowing quietly on the beach, is an attractive aqua scent. 
No.45 Morning Rain 30ml : Clean and calm moist scent of blooming flowers with a refreshing breeze a small bottle of dew at dawn contains cool and fresh nature. 
No.48 Peach Love Osmanthus 30ml : Lovely fruity floral scent with sweetness of ripe peach and warmness from osmanthus. 
No.49 Peach Blossom 30ml : Elegance and sweetness of savory peach it contains the real sweet and fresh peach. 
No.97 April Cotton 30ml :  Fragrance that you want to rub on your cheek feel the warm and silky soft with comfort. 
No.214 Hazelnut in Chocolate 30ml : Creamy chocolate flavor with the sweetness of a cup of chocolate latte. 
No.314 Strawberry in Cream 30ml : Sweet fruity flavored with fragrant strawberries and soft vanilla cream, like a bite of a sweet strawberry cake. 

How To Use

- Spray in any room, car, or directly on fabric to freshen the air 
- Test before applying on delicate fabrics 
- Avoid finished wood
extra_description:
- Spray in any room, car, or directly on fabric to freshen the air 
- Test before applying on delicate fabrics 
- Avoid finished wood

description:
Description

A mild exfoliating body mist from mixsoon's H.C.T. Line for acne prone skin type.
Star ingredients include Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, and Centella Asiatica Extract that forms a synergy to soothe troubled and irritated skin.
Enriched with BHA ingredients to gently exfoliate skin and 3 types of Hyaluronic Acid to hydrate skin.
Fine mist spray formula clinically tested to be non-irritant to the skin.
 
How To Use
Spray an adequate amount onto the body from a 15-20 cm distance. Do not spray product on face.

description:
Description
This perfume roll-on is perfect for travelling and when on the go. Comes in a convenient test tube-sized bottle with a roll that can be easily applied anywhere and anytime. Divine fragrances that last a long time, with minimal ingredients. Available in the following scents: 
Freesia – Vibrant & refreshing floral scent (Top notes: Pear, Lemon, Lime, Orange, Tangerine, Middle notes: Freesia, Lilly of the Valley, Rose, Base Notes: Musk, Patchouli)

Suggested Use
Using the attached roll applicator, simply apply the perfume directly onto the skin and spread it with the rollKey Ingredients

Ethanol, purified water, dipropylene glycol, ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, ethylhexyl salicylate, BT, octocrylene, fragrance, limonene, butylphenylmethylpropional, geraniol, hexylcinnamal, benzylbenzo eight, linalool, citronellol, citral.

description:
Description


German luxury undiluted solution, maintain natural and soft scent for bathroom, toilet, kitchen, bed room, work, shoe rack, car, carpet, valentine gifts.

Dress & Living Clear Perfume, Anti-bacteria, deodorant.


#No.02 Coco.Conut - Absolutely adorable creamy scent with warmness real coconut milk blended with sweet vanilla beans.
#No.03 Baby Greentea - A refreshing green tea musk scent with the softness of delicate green tea leaves and the freshness of citrus. 
#No.09 Gogo Mango - Ultimate sweetness, sweet mango
#No.10 October Woody - A comfortable, neutral woody scent with sweet neroli and calming cedar wood scents.
#No.11 White Soap - The power of soap. A clean and soothing scent like walking in the clouds. Feeling a compfortable and clean scent at all times

#No.12 Very Berry - Imagine a blackberry at its peak maturity very sweet and tangy with incredible freshness.

#No.14 Lemon & Lime - Fresh feeling beneath warm sunlight it is aa fresh blend of lemon and lime

#No.18 Gentleman Code - Scent of a strong man feel the intense aroma charisma of modern and pioneering man

#No.34 Always Happy - Sweetest scent will make your day happy imagine a lovely butterfly is happily dancing in the flower garden.
#No.35 Green Earth - Earth's soft jasmine scent and moist patchouli scent combined with RESSROOM, a warm citrus scent.

#No.41 Jas-mint - The mint overpowers the jasmine in a cooling freshness feel the zesty mint blending with white pure jasmine.

#No.45 Morning Rain - Clean and calm moist scent of blooming flowers with a refreshing breeze a small bottle of dew at dawn contains cool and fresh nature.

#No.46 Pure Lily - A soft white floral aroma reminding you of a fresh garden it is an exotic and trimmed scent of lily.

#No.47 Fig Leaf - A distinctive scent of fig juice with fresh green aroma of fig leaf and unique sweetness.#No.48 Peach Love OsmanThus - The sweet scent of a perfectly ripe peach combined with the rich and warm aroma of osmanthus creates a lovely fruity floral scent.

#No.49 Peach Blossom - Elegance and sweetness of savory peach it contains the real sweet and fresh peach.

#No.50 Green Apple - Dual charm of sweetness and freshness feel the charming freshness of crispy green apple.

#No.51 Juicy Grapefruit - Youthfull and sweet citrus scents containing a fresh grapefruit fill your day with energy by feeling drink of cool grapefruit juice.

#No.53 Mediterranean Breeze - Fresh and clear mediterranean ocean scent of refreshing breeze as if you are walking along the meditterranean coast.

#No. 55 Green Grape Sherbet - Fresh grape feast. The cool grape fragrance, full with fresh fruit and the sweetness of candy scent.

#No.64 Lovely Rose - Fragrance containing the loveliness of a rose inviting you in the elegant and romantic rose garden.

#No.90 Pomegranate - Fragrance of mystery and refreshing sweetness of pomegranate feel the energy of fresh pomegranate.

#No.97 April Cotton - Fragrance that you want to rub on your cheek feel the warm and silky soft with comfort.

#No. 98 Secret Musk - Fragrance that a floral musk fragrance with the harmony of roses and warmth.
Suggested Use


For use in any room, your car or directly on garments and clothes as you iron or after to freshen.
Test on an inside seam prior to spraying on delicate fabrics and avoid spraying on finished wood.

product_name: Dress & Living Clear Perfume 150ml (No.46 Pure Lily)
description:
Description


German luxury undiluted solution, maintain natural and soft scent for bathroom, toilet, kitchen, bed room, work, shoe rack, car, capet, valentine gifts.#No.46 Pure Lily - A soft white floral aroma reminding you of a fresh garden it is an exotic and trimmed scent of lily.Suggested Use


For use in any room, your car or directly on garments and clothes as you iron or after to freshen. Test on an inside seam prior to spraying on delicate fabrics and avoid spraying on finished wood.

Cautions


- Avoid eye contact. If product gets in eyes, rins with water. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children and pets.
* If you have any symptoms as followings after using this product, stop using the product. If you keep using it, symptoms may get worse, therefore, consult with dermatologist.
- In the case of occurring red blotch, skin irritation, and stimulation.
- In the case of any symptoms occurred when exposing to direct sunlight.
* Do not use on spots with injury, edema, or dermatitis.
* Instructions for storage and handling.
- Close the cap after use.
- Keep out of reach from infants and children.
- Keep away from high and low temperature and direct sunlight.
